infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: here&now needs your location to show stories near you and let you add stories to places.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: here&now needs your location to discover stories around you.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: here&now needs camera access to scan QR codes and take photos for your stories.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: here&now needs photo library access to add images to your stories.

plugins.cameraPermission: Allow here&now to access your camera to scan QR codes and capture photos.

plugins.locationAlwaysAndWhenInUsePermission: Allow here&now to use your location to discover and share stories.

plugins.photosPermission: Allow here&now to access your photos to add images to stories.
plugins.cameraPermission: Allow here&now to use your camera to take photos for stories.
